question: Which of the following Fundamental Right cannot be suspended even during National Emergency?
option1: Right to life and personal liberty
option2: Right to move freely through out the territory of India
option3: Right to reside and settle in any part of the country
option4: Right to carry on any profession or business
answer: Right to life and personal liberty
explanation: If the National Emergency is declared on the ground of war or external aggression the fundamental rights under Article 19 are automatically suspended. However, the rights of life and liberty (Article 21) cannot be suspended even during National Emergency.
